channel.title: {508 PALI} MapData.java Replacement Issue
channel.description:
Before anything, I CAN CODE. I have good experience with Java so I can understand any help. Just please make it more then 1 line ^_^.
I'm using an old Palidino76 base and have changed a ton in it but I really can't manage to get a modern MapData.java working, I need it because mostly all of the mapdata that I have right now barely works and crashes the client all the time. NORMALLY when I try to replace the MapData.java and then change the method in Frames.java to getMapData( from getData(, It returns me this error:
[CODE]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at voltscape.rs2.io.Frames.setMapRegion(Frames.java:955) at voltscape.rs2.io.Login.login(Login.java:195) at voltscape.rs2.Engine.connectAwaitingPlayers(Engine.java:252) at voltscape.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:145) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE]
Can anybody help me please?

item.title: {508 PALI} MapData.java Replacement Issue
item.dc:creator: @sashavol sashavol
item.description:
@sashavol wrote:

Before anything, I CAN CODE. I have good experience with Java so I can understand any help. Just please make it more then 1 line ^_^.

I’m using an old Palidino76 base and have changed a ton in it but I really can’t manage to get a modern MapData.java working, I need it because mostly all of the mapdata that I have right now barely works and crashes the client all the time. NORMALLY when I try to replace the MapData.java and then change the method in Frames.java to getMapData( from getData(, It returns me this error:
